body:
Doing another one of these.

Ask me questions and I'll make a video responding to most of them (this time hopefully on Avicus). Just like last time, I'll upload when I get the chance. Simple enough? Ok.

Previous AMA: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c95yHc54adY&list=UUrF4PBR7jOF1R0wgY_awzlg
New AMA: (Will be here when finished).

title: AMA V2. + VIDEO

replies.body: If you could be a female for 24 hours, what would you do in that time?

replies.body: If you could add 1 rule to Avicus, what would it be.

replies.body: What do you enjoy more? Being the nice mod role model or the "popular" keyboard warrior?
